00077 BLI_INLINE int text_pixel_x_to_index(SpaceText *st, const int x)
00078 {
00079     /* add half the char width so mouse cursor selection is inbetween letters */
00080     return (x + (st->cwidth / 2)) / st->cwidth;
00081 }

00084 {
00085     return 1;

00088 static int text_edit_poll(bContext *C)
00089 {
00090     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00091 
00092     if (!text)
00093         return 0;
00094 
00095     if (text->id.lib) {
00096         // BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't edit external libdata");
00097         return 0;
00098     }
00099 
00100     return 1;
00101 }

00103 static int text_space_edit_poll(bContext *C)
00104 {
00105     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
00106     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00107 
00108     if (!st || !text)
00109         return 0;
00110 
00111     if (text->id.lib) {
00112         // BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't edit external libdata");
00113         return 0;
00114     }
00115 
00116     return 1;
00117 }

00119 static int text_region_edit_poll(bContext *C)
00120 {
00121     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
00122     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00123     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00124 
00125     if (!st || !text)
00126         return 0;
00127     
00128     if (!ar || ar->regiontype != RGN_TYPE_WINDOW)
00129         return 0;
00130 
00131     if (text->id.lib) {
00132         // BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't edit external libdata");
00133         return 0;
00134     }
00135 
00136     return 1;
00137 }

00139 /********************** updates *********************/
00140 
00141 void text_update_line_edited(TextLine *line)
00142 {
00143     if (!line)
00144         return;
00145 
00146     /* we just free format here, and let it rebuild during draw */
00147     if (line->format) {
00148         MEM_freeN(line->format);
00149         line->format = NULL;
00150     }
00151 }
00152 
00153 void text_update_edited(Text *text)
00154 {
00155     TextLine *line;
00156 
00157     for (line = text->lines.first; line; line = line->next)
00158         text_update_line_edited(line);
00159 }

00161 /******************* new operator *********************/
00162 
00163 static int text_new_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00164 {
00165     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
00166     Text *text;
00167     PointerRNA ptr, idptr;
00168     PropertyRNA *prop;
00169 
00170     text = add_empty_text("Text");
00171 
00172     /* hook into UI */
00173     uiIDContextProperty(C, &ptr, &prop);
00174 
00175     if (prop) {
00176         /* when creating new ID blocks, use is already 1, but RNA
00177          * pointer se also increases user, so this compensates it */
00178         /* doesnt always seem to happen... (ton) */
00179         if (text->id.us > 1)
00180             text->id.us--;
00181 
00182         RNA_id_pointer_create(&text->id, &idptr);
00183         RNA_property_pointer_set(&ptr, prop, idptr);
00184         RNA_property_update(C, &ptr, prop);
00185     }
00186     else if (st) {
00187         st->text = text;
00188         st->top = 0;
00189         text_drawcache_tag_update(st, 1);
00190     }
00191 
00192     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_ADDED, text);
00193 
00194     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00195 }

00214 static void text_open_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00215 {
00216     PropertyPointerRNA *pprop;
00217 
00218     op->customdata = pprop = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PropertyPointerRNA), "OpenPropertyPointerRNA");
00219     uiIDContextProperty(C, &pprop->ptr, &pprop->prop);
00220 }

00222 static int text_open_cancel(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
00223 {
00224     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00225     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00226 }
00227 
00228 static int text_open_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00229 {
00230     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
00231     Text *text;
00232     PropertyPointerRNA *pprop;
00233     PointerRNA idptr;
00234     char str[FILE_MAX];
00235     short internal = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "internal");
00236 
00237     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", str);
00238 
00239     text = add_text(str, G.main->name);
00240 
00241     if (!text) {
00242         if (op->customdata) MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00243         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00244     }
00245 
00246     if (!op->customdata)
00247         text_open_init(C, op);
00248 
00249     /* hook into UI */
00250     pprop = op->customdata;
00251 
00252     if (pprop->prop) {
00253         /* when creating new ID blocks, use is already 1, but RNA
00254          * pointer se also increases user, so this compensates it */
00255         text->id.us--;
00256 
00257         RNA_id_pointer_create(&text->id, &idptr);
00258         RNA_property_pointer_set(&pprop->ptr, pprop->prop, idptr);
00259         RNA_property_update(C, &pprop->ptr, pprop->prop);
00260     }
00261     else if (st) {
00262         st->text = text;
00263         st->top = 0;
00264     }
00265     
00266     if (internal) {
00267         if (text->name)
00268             MEM_freeN(text->name);
00269         
00270         text->name = NULL;
00271     }
00272 
00273     text_drawcache_tag_update(st, 1);
00274     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_ADDED, text);
00275 
00276     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00277 
00278     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00279 }

00281 static int text_open_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00282 {
00283     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00284     char *path = (text && text->name) ? text->name : G.main->name;
00285 
00286     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath"))
00287         return text_open_exec(C, op);
00288     
00289     text_open_init(C, op);
00290     RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
00291     WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op); 
00292 
00293     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00294 }

00317 /******************* reload operator *********************/
00318 
00319 static int text_reload_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00320 {
00321     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00322 
00323     if (!reopen_text(text)) {
00324         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Could not reopen file");
00325         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00326     }
00327 
00328 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00329     if (text->compiled)
00330         BPY_text_free_code(text);
00331 #endif
00332 
00333     text_update_edited(text);
00334     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
00335     text_drawcache_tag_update(CTX_wm_space_text(C), 1);
00336     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
00337 
00338     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00339 }

00356 static int text_unlink_poll(bContext *C)

00360 }
00361 
00362 static int text_unlink_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00363 {
00364     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00365     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
00366     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00367 
00368     /* make the previous text active, if its not there make the next text active */
00369     if (st) {
00370         if (text->id.prev) {
00371             st->text = text->id.prev;
00372             text_update_cursor_moved(C);
00373             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, st->text);
00374         }
00375         else if (text->id.next) {
00376             st->text = text->id.next;
00377             text_update_cursor_moved(C);
00378             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, st->text);
00379         }
00380     }
00381 
00382     unlink_text(bmain, text);
00383     free_libblock(&bmain->text, text);
00384 
00385     text_drawcache_tag_update(st, 1);
00386     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_REMOVED, NULL);
00387 
00388     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00389 }

00409 static int text_make_internal_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00410 {
00411     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00412 
00413     text->flags |= TXT_ISMEM | TXT_ISDIRTY;
00414 
00415     if (text->name) {
00416         MEM_freeN(text->name);
00417         text->name = NULL;
00418     }
00419 
00420     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
00421     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
00422 
00423     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00424 }

00443 static int text_save_poll(bContext *C)
00444 {
00445     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00446 
00447     if (!text_edit_poll(C))
00448         return 0;
00449     
00450     return (text->name != NULL && !(text->flags & TXT_ISMEM));
00451 }
00452 
00453 static void txt_write_file(Text *text, ReportList *reports) 
00454 {
00455     FILE *fp;
00456     TextLine *tmp;
00457     struct stat st;
00458     char filepath[FILE_MAX];
00459     
00460     BLI_strncpy(filepath, text->name, FILE_MAX);
00461     BLI_path_abs(filepath, G.main->name);
00462     
00463     fp = BLI_fopen(filepath, "w");
00464     if (fp == NULL) {
00465         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unable to save \"%s\": %s", filepath, errno ? strerror(errno) : "Unknown error writing file");
00466         return;
00467     }
00468 
00469     tmp = text->lines.first;
00470     while (tmp) {
00471         if (tmp->next) fprintf(fp, "%s\n", tmp->line);
00472         else fprintf(fp, "%s", tmp->line);
00473         
00474         tmp = tmp->next;
00475     }
00476     
00477     fclose(fp);
00478 
00479     if (stat(filepath, &st) == 0) {
00480         text->mtime = st.st_mtime;
00481     }
00482     else {
00483         text->mtime = 0;
00484         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Unable to stat \"%s\": %s", filepath, errno ? strerror(errno) : "Unknown error starrng file");
00485     }
00486     
00487     if (text->flags & TXT_ISDIRTY)
00488         text->flags ^= TXT_ISDIRTY;
00489 }
00490 
00491 static int text_save_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00492 {
00493     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00494 
00495     txt_write_file(text, op->reports);
00496 
00497     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
00498     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
00499 
00500     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00501 }

00515 /******************* save as operator *********************/
00516 
00517 static int text_save_as_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00518 {
00519     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00520     char str[FILE_MAX];
00521 
00522     if (!text)
00523         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00524 
00525     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", str);
00526 
00527     if (text->name) MEM_freeN(text->name);
00528     text->name = BLI_strdup(str);
00529     text->flags &= ~TXT_ISMEM;
00530 
00531     txt_write_file(text, op->reports);
00532 
00533     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
00534     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
00535 
00536     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00537 }
00538 
00539 static int text_save_as_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00540 {
00541     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00542     char *str;
00543 
00544     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath"))
00545         return text_save_as_exec(C, op);
00546 
00547     if (text->name)
00548         str = text->name;
00549     else if (text->flags & TXT_ISMEM)
00550         str = text->id.name + 2;
00551     else
00552         str = G.main->name;
00553     
00554     RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", str);
00555     WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op); 
00556 
00557     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00558 }

00582 
00583 static int text_run_script(bContext *C, ReportList *reports)
00584 {
00585 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00586     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00587     const short is_live = (reports == NULL);
00588 
00589     /* only for comparison */
00590     void *curl_prev = text->curl;
00591     int curc_prev = text->curc;
00592 
00593     if (BPY_text_exec(C, text, reports, !is_live)) {
00594         if (is_live) {
00595             /* for nice live updates */
00596             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW | NA_EDITED, NULL);
00597         }
00598         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00599     }
00600 
00601     /* Don't report error messages while live editing */
00602     if (!is_live) {
00603         if (text->curl != curl_prev || curc_prev != text->curc) {
00604             text_update_cursor_moved(C);
00605             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
00606         }
00607 
00608         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Python script fail, look in the console for now...");
00609     }
00610 #else
00611     (void)C;
00612     (void)reports;
00613 #endif /* !WITH_PYTHON */
00614     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00615 }
00616 
00617 static int text_run_script_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00618 {
00619 #ifndef WITH_PYTHON
00620     (void)C; /* unused */
00621 
00622     BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Python disabled in this build");
00623 
00624     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00625 #else
00626     return text_run_script(C, op->reports);
00627 #endif
00628 }

00645 /******************* refresh pyconstraints operator *********************/
00646 
00647 static int text_refresh_pyconstraints_exec(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00648 {
00649 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00650 #if 0
00651     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00652     Object *ob;
00653     bConstraint *con;
00654     short update;
00655     
00656     /* check all pyconstraints */
00657     for (ob = CTX_data_main(C)->object.first; ob; ob = ob->id.next) {
00658         update = 0;
00659         if (ob->type == OB_ARMATURE && ob->pose) {
00660             bPoseChannel *pchan;
00661             for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
00662                 for (con = pchan->constraints.first; con; con = con->next) {
00663                     if (con->type == CONSTRAINT_TYPE_PYTHON) {
00664                         bPythonConstraint *data = con->data;
00665                         if (data->text == text) BPY_pyconstraint_update(ob, con);
00666                         update = 1;
00667                         
00668                     }
00669                 }
00670             }
00671         }
00672         for (con = ob->constraints.first; con; con = con->next) {
00673             if (con->type == CONSTRAINT_TYPE_PYTHON) {
00674                 bPythonConstraint *data = con->data;
00675                 if (data->text == text) BPY_pyconstraint_update(ob, con);
00676                 update = 1;
00677             }
00678         }
00679         
00680         if (update) {
00681             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00682         }
00683     }
00684 #endif
00685 #endif
00686 
00687     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00688 }
00689

00701 
00702 /******************* paste operator *********************/
00703 
00704 static char *txt_copy_selected(Text *text)
00705 {
00706     TextLine *tmp, *linef, *linel;
00707     char *buf = NULL;
00708     int charf, charl, length = 0;
00709     
00710     if (!text) return NULL;
00711     if (!text->curl) return NULL;
00712     if (!text->sell) return NULL;
00713 
00714     if (!txt_has_sel(text)) return NULL;
00715 
00716     if (text->curl == text->sell) {
00717         linef = linel = text->curl;
00718         
00719         if (text->curc < text->selc) {
00720             charf = text->curc;
00721             charl = text->selc;
00722         }
00723         else {
00724             charf = text->selc;
00725             charl = text->curc;
00726         }
00727     }
00728     else if (txt_get_span(text->curl, text->sell) < 0) {
00729         linef = text->sell;
00730         linel = text->curl;
00731 
00732         charf = text->selc;
00733         charl = text->curc;
00734     }
00735     else {
00736         linef = text->curl;
00737         linel = text->sell;
00738         
00739         charf = text->curc;
00740         charl = text->selc;
00741     }
00742 
00743     if (linef == linel) {
00744         length = charl - charf;
00745 
00746         buf = MEM_callocN(length + 1, "cut buffera");
00747         
00748         BLI_strncpy(buf, linef->line + charf, length + 1);
00749     }
00750     else {
00751         length += linef->len - charf;
00752         length += charl;
00753         length++; /* For the '\n' */
00754         
00755         tmp = linef->next;
00756         while (tmp && tmp != linel) {
00757             length += tmp->len + 1;
00758             tmp = tmp->next;
00759         }
00760         
00761         buf = MEM_callocN(length + 1, "cut bufferb");
00762         
00763         strncpy(buf, linef->line + charf, linef->len - charf);
00764         length = linef->len - charf;
00765         
00766         buf[length++] = '\n';
00767         
00768         tmp = linef->next;
00769         while (tmp && tmp != linel) {
00770             strncpy(buf + length, tmp->line, tmp->len);
00771             length += tmp->len;
00772             
00773             buf[length++] = '\n';
00774             
00775             tmp = tmp->next;
00776         }
00777         strncpy(buf + length, linel->line, charl);
00778         length += charl;
00779         
00780         buf[length] = 0;
00781     }
00782 
00783     return buf;
00784 }
00785 
00786 static int text_paste_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00787 {
00788     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00789     char *buf;
00790     int selection = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "selection");
00791 
00792     buf = WM_clipboard_text_get(selection);
00793 
00794     if (!buf)
00795         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00796 
00797     text_drawcache_tag_update(CTX_wm_space_text(C), 0);
00798 
00799     txt_insert_buf(text, buf);
00800     text_update_edited(text);
00801 
00802     MEM_freeN(buf);
00803 
00804     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
00805     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
00806 
00807     /* run the script while editing, evil but useful */
00808     if (CTX_wm_space_text(C)->live_edit)
00809         text_run_script(C, NULL);
00810 
00811     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00812 }
00813

00820     
00821     /* api callbacks */
00822     ot->exec = text_paste_exec;
00823     ot->poll = text_edit_poll;
00824     
00825     /* properties */
00826     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "selection", 0, "Selection", "Paste text selected elsewhere rather than copied (X11 only)");
00827 }

00967 /******************* line break operator *********************/
00968 
00969 static int text_line_break_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00970 {
00971     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
00972     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
00973     int a, curts;
00974     int space = (text->flags & TXT_TABSTOSPACES) ? st->tabnumber : 1;
00975 
00976     text_drawcache_tag_update(st, 0);
00977 
00978     // double check tabs/spaces before splitting the line
00979     curts = setcurr_tab_spaces(text, space);
00980     txt_split_curline(text);
00981 
00982     for (a = 0; a < curts; a++) {
00983         if (text->flags & TXT_TABSTOSPACES) {
00984             txt_add_char(text, ' ');
00985         }
00986         else {
00987             txt_add_char(text, '\t');
00988         }
00989     }
00990 
00991     if (text->curl) {
00992         if (text->curl->prev)
00993             text_update_line_edited(text->curl->prev);
00994         text_update_line_edited(text->curl);
00995     }
00996 
00997     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
00998     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
00999 
01000     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01001 }
01002

01081 
01082 /******************* convert whitespace operator *********************/
01083 
01084 enum { TO_SPACES, TO_TABS };
01085 static EnumPropertyItem whitespace_type_items[] = {
01086     {TO_SPACES, "SPACES", 0, "To Spaces", NULL},
01087     {TO_TABS, "TABS", 0, "To Tabs", NULL},
01088     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
01089 
01090 static int text_convert_whitespace_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01091 {
01092     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
01093     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
01094     TextLine *tmp;
01095     FlattenString fs;
01096     size_t a, j;
01097     char *text_check_line, *new_line;
01098     int extra, number; //unknown for now
01099     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
01100     
01101     tmp = text->lines.first;
01102     
01103     //first convert to all space, this make it a lot easier to convert to tabs because there is no mixtures of ' ' && '\t'
01104     while (tmp) {
01105         text_check_line = tmp->line;
01106         number = flatten_string(st, &fs, text_check_line) + 1;
01107         flatten_string_free(&fs);
01108         new_line = MEM_callocN(number, "Converted_Line");
01109         j = 0;
01110         for (a = 0; a < strlen(text_check_line); a++) { //foreach char in line
01111             if (text_check_line[a] == '\t') { //checking for tabs
01112                 //get the number of spaces this tabs is showing
01113                 //i don't like doing it this way but will look into it later
01114                 new_line[j] = '\0';
01115                 number = flatten_string(st, &fs, new_line);
01116                 flatten_string_free(&fs);
01117                 new_line[j] = '\t';
01118                 new_line[j + 1] = '\0';
01119                 number = flatten_string(st, &fs, new_line) - number;
01120                 flatten_string_free(&fs);
01121 
01122                 for (extra = 0; extra < number; extra++) {
01123                     new_line[j] = ' ';
01124                     j++;
01125                 }
01126             }
01127             else {
01128                 new_line[j] = text_check_line[a];
01129                 ++j;
01130             }
01131         }
01132         new_line[j] = '\0';
01133         // put new_line in the tmp->line spot still need to try and set the curc correctly
01134         if (tmp->line) MEM_freeN(tmp->line);
01135         if (tmp->format) MEM_freeN(tmp->format);
01136         
01137         tmp->line = new_line;
01138         tmp->len = strlen(new_line);
01139         tmp->format = NULL;
01140         tmp = tmp->next;
01141     }
01142     
01143     if (type == TO_TABS) { // Converting to tabs
01144         //start over from the beginning
01145         tmp = text->lines.first;
01146         
01147         while (tmp) {
01148             text_check_line = tmp->line;
01149             extra = 0;
01150             for (a = 0; a < strlen(text_check_line); a++) {
01151                 number = 0;
01152                 for (j = 0; j < (size_t)st->tabnumber; j++) {
01153                     if ((a + j) <= strlen(text_check_line)) { //check to make sure we are not pass the end of the line
01154                         if (text_check_line[a + j] != ' ') {
01155                             number = 1;
01156                         }
01157                     }
01158                 }
01159                 if (!number) { //found all number of space to equal a tab
01160                     a = a + (st->tabnumber - 1);
01161                     extra = extra + 1;
01162                 }
01163             }
01164             
01165             if (extra > 0) {   //got tabs make malloc and do what you have to do
01166                 new_line = MEM_callocN(strlen(text_check_line) - (((st->tabnumber * extra) - extra) - 1), "Converted_Line");
01167                 extra = 0; //reuse vars
01168                 for (a = 0; a < strlen(text_check_line); a++) {
01169                     number = 0;
01170                     for (j = 0; j < (size_t)st->tabnumber; j++) {
01171                         if ((a + j) <= strlen(text_check_line)) { //check to make sure we are not pass the end of the line
01172                             if (text_check_line[a + j] != ' ') {
01173                                 number = 1;
01174                             }
01175                         }
01176                     }
01177 
01178                     if (!number) { //found all number of space to equal a tab
01179                         new_line[extra] = '\t';
01180                         a = a + (st->tabnumber - 1);
01181                         ++extra;
01182                         
01183                     }
01184                     else { //not adding a tab
01185                         new_line[extra] = text_check_line[a];
01186                         ++extra;
01187                     }
01188                 }
01189                 new_line[extra] = '\0';
01190                 // put new_line in the tmp->line spot still need to try and set the curc correctly
01191                 if (tmp->line) MEM_freeN(tmp->line);
01192                 if (tmp->format) MEM_freeN(tmp->format);
01193                 
01194                 tmp->line = new_line;
01195                 tmp->len = strlen(new_line);
01196                 tmp->format = NULL;
01197             }
01198             tmp = tmp->next;
01199         }
01200     }
01201 
01202     text_update_edited(text);
01203     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
01204     text_drawcache_tag_update(st, 1);
01205     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
01206 
01207     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01208 }
01209 
01210 void TEXT_OT_convert_whitespace(wmOperatorType *ot)
01211 {
01212     /* identifiers */
01213     ot->name = "Convert Whitespace";
01214     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_convert_whitespace";
01215     ot->description = "Convert whitespaces by type";
01216     
01217     /* api callbacks */
01218     ot->exec = text_convert_whitespace_exec;
01219     ot->poll = text_edit_poll;
01220 
01221     /* properties */
01222     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", whitespace_type_items, TO_SPACES, "Type", "Type of whitespace to convert to");
01223 }

01304 /******************* previous marker operator *********************/
01305 
01306 static int text_previous_marker_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01307 {
01308     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
01309     TextMarker *mrk;
01310     int lineno;
01311 
01312     lineno = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->curl);
01313     mrk = text->markers.last;
01314     while (mrk && (mrk->lineno > lineno || (mrk->lineno == lineno && mrk->end > text->curc)))
01315         mrk = mrk->prev;
01316     if (!mrk) mrk = text->markers.last;
01317     if (mrk) {
01318         txt_move_to(text, mrk->lineno, mrk->start, 0);
01319         txt_move_to(text, mrk->lineno, mrk->end, 1);
01320     }
01321 
01322     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
01323     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
01324 
01325     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01326 }
01327 
01328 void TEXT_OT_previous_marker(wmOperatorType *ot)

01335     /* api callbacks */
01336     ot->exec = text_previous_marker_exec;
01337     ot->poll = text_edit_poll;
01338 }
01339 
01340 /******************* next marker operator *********************/
01341 
01342 static int text_next_marker_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01343 {
01344     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
01345     TextMarker *mrk;
01346     int lineno;
01347 
01348     lineno = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->curl);
01349     mrk = text->markers.first;
01350     while (mrk && (mrk->lineno < lineno || (mrk->lineno == lineno && mrk->start <= text->curc)))
01351         mrk = mrk->next;
01352     if (!mrk) mrk = text->markers.first;
01353     if (mrk) {
01354         txt_move_to(text, mrk->lineno, mrk->start, 0);
01355         txt_move_to(text, mrk->lineno, mrk->end, 1);
01356     }
01357 
01358     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
01359     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
01360 
01361     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01362 }
01363 
01364 void TEXT_OT_next_marker(wmOperatorType *ot)

01401 
01402 /************************ move operator ************************/
01403 
01404 static EnumPropertyItem move_type_items[] = {
01405     {LINE_BEGIN, "LINE_BEGIN", 0, "Line Begin", ""},
01406     {LINE_END, "LINE_END", 0, "Line End", ""},
01407     {FILE_TOP, "FILE_TOP", 0, "File Top", ""},
01408     {FILE_BOTTOM, "FILE_BOTTOM", 0, "File Bottom", ""},
01409     {PREV_CHAR, "PREVIOUS_CHARACTER", 0, "Previous Character", ""},
01410     {NEXT_CHAR, "NEXT_CHARACTER", 0, "Next Character", ""},
01411     {PREV_WORD, "PREVIOUS_WORD", 0, "Previous Word", ""},
01412     {NEXT_WORD, "NEXT_WORD", 0, "Next Word", ""},
01413     {PREV_LINE, "PREVIOUS_LINE", 0, "Previous Line", ""},
01414     {NEXT_LINE, "NEXT_LINE", 0, "Next Line", ""},
01415     {PREV_PAGE, "PREVIOUS_PAGE", 0, "Previous Page", ""},
01416     {NEXT_PAGE, "NEXT_PAGE", 0, "Next Page", ""},
01417     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
01418 
01419 /* get cursor position in line by relative wrapped line and column positions */
01420 static int text_get_cursor_rel(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, TextLine *linein, int rell, int relc)
01421 {
01422     int i, j, start, end, max, chop, curs, loop, endj, found, selc;
01423     char ch;
01424 
01425     max = wrap_width(st, ar);
01426 
01427     selc = start = endj = curs = found = 0;
01428     end = max;
01429     chop = loop = 1;
01430 
01431     for (i = 0, j = 0; loop; j += BLI_str_utf8_size(linein->line + j)) {
01432         int chars;
01433         /* Mimic replacement of tabs */
01434         ch = linein->line[j];
01435         if (ch == '\t') {
01436             chars = st->tabnumber - i % st->tabnumber;
01437             ch = ' ';
01438         }
01439         else chars = 1;
01440 
01441         while (chars--) {
01442             if (rell == 0 && i - start == relc) {
01443                 /* current position could be wrapped to next line */
01444                 /* this should be checked when end of current line would be reached */
01445                 selc = j;
01446                 found = 1;
01447             }
01448             else if (i - end == relc) {
01449                 curs = j;
01450             }
01451             if (i - start >= max) {
01452                 if (found) {
01453                     /* exact cursor position was found, check if it's */
01454                     /* still on needed line (hasn't been wrapped) */
01455                     if (selc > endj && !chop) selc = endj;
01456                     loop = 0;
01457                     break;
01458                 }
01459 
01460                 if (chop) endj = j;
01461 
01462                 start = end;
01463                 end += max;
01464                 chop = 1;
01465                 rell--;
01466 
01467                 if (rell == 0 && i - start >= relc) {
01468                     selc = curs;
01469                     loop = 0;
01470                     break;
01471                 }
01472             }
01473             else if (ch == '\0') {
01474                 if (!found) selc = linein->len;
01475                 loop = 0;
01476                 break;
01477             }
01478             else if (ch == ' ' || ch == '-') {
01479                 if (found) {
01480                     loop = 0;
01481                     break;
01482                 }
01483 
01484                 if (rell == 0 && i - start >= relc) {
01485                     selc = curs;
01486                     loop = 0;
01487                     break;
01488                 }
01489                 end = i + 1;
01490                 endj = j;
01491                 chop = 0;
01492             }
01493             i++;
01494         }
01495     }
01496 
01497     return selc;
01498 }
01499 
01500 static int cursor_skip_find_line(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar,
01501                                  int lines, TextLine **linep, int *charp, int *rell, int *relc)
01502 {
01503     int offl, offc, visible_lines;
01504 
01505     wrap_offset_in_line(st, ar, *linep, *charp, &offl, &offc);
01506     *relc = text_get_char_pos(st, (*linep)->line, *charp) + offc;
01507     *rell = lines;
01508 
01509     /* handle current line */
01510     if (lines > 0) {
01511         visible_lines = text_get_visible_lines(st, ar, (*linep)->line);
01512 
01513         if (*rell - visible_lines + offl >= 0) {
01514             if (!(*linep)->next) {
01515                 if (offl < visible_lines - 1) {
01516                     *rell = visible_lines - 1;
01517                     return 1;
01518                 }
01519 
01520                 *charp = (*linep)->len;
01521                 return 0;
01522             }
01523 
01524             *rell -= visible_lines - offl;
01525             *linep = (*linep)->next;
01526         }
01527         else {
01528             *rell += offl;
01529             return 1;
01530         }
01531     }
01532     else {
01533         if (*rell + offl <= 0) {
01534             if (!(*linep)->prev) {
01535                 if (offl) {
01536                     *rell = 0;
01537                     return 1;
01538                 }
01539 
01540                 *charp = 0;
01541                 return 0;
01542             }
01543 
01544             *rell += offl;
01545             *linep = (*linep)->prev;
01546         }
01547         else {
01548             *rell += offl;
01549             return 1;
01550         }
01551     }
01552 
01553     /* skip lines and find destination line and offsets */
01554     while (*linep) {
01555         visible_lines = text_get_visible_lines(st, ar, (*linep)->line);
01556 
01557         if (lines < 0) { /* moving top */
01558             if (*rell + visible_lines >= 0) {
01559                 *rell += visible_lines;
01560                 break;
01561             }
01562 
01563             if (!(*linep)->prev) {
01564                 *rell = 0;
01565                 break;
01566             }
01567 
01568             *rell += visible_lines;
01569             *linep = (*linep)->prev;
01570         }
01571         else { /* moving bottom */
01572             if (*rell - visible_lines < 0) break;
01573 
01574             if (!(*linep)->next) {
01575                 *rell = visible_lines - 1;
01576                 break;
01577             }
01578 
01579             *rell -= visible_lines;
01580             *linep = (*linep)->next;
01581         }
01582     }
01583 
01584     return 1;
01585 }
01586 
01587 static void txt_wrap_move_bol(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, short sel)
01588 {
01589     Text *text = st->text;
01590     TextLine **linep;
01591     int *charp;
01592     int oldl, oldc, i, j, max, start, end, endj, chop, loop;
01593     char ch;
01594 
01595     text_update_character_width(st);
01596 
01597     if (sel) linep = &text->sell, charp = &text->selc;
01598     else linep = &text->curl, charp = &text->curc;
01599 
01600     oldc = *charp;
01601     oldl = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep);
01602 
01603     max = wrap_width(st, ar);
01604 
01605     start = endj = 0;
01606     end = max;
01607     chop = loop = 1;
01608     *charp = 0;
01609 
01610     for (i = 0, j = 0; loop; j += BLI_str_utf8_size((*linep)->line + j)) {
01611         int chars;
01612         /* Mimic replacement of tabs */
01613         ch = (*linep)->line[j];
01614         if (ch == '\t') {
01615             chars = st->tabnumber - i % st->tabnumber;
01616             ch = ' ';
01617         }
01618         else chars = 1;
01619 
01620         while (chars--) {
01621             if (i - start >= max) {
01622                 *charp = endj;
01623 
01624                 if (j >= oldc) {
01625                     if (ch == '\0') *charp = txt_utf8_index_to_offset((*linep)->line, start);
01626                     loop = 0;
01627                     break;
01628                 }
01629 
01630                 if (chop) endj = j;
01631 
01632                 start = end;
01633                 end += max;
01634                 chop = 1;
01635             }
01636             else if (ch == ' ' || ch == '-' || ch == '\0') {
01637                 if (j >= oldc) {
01638                     *charp = txt_utf8_index_to_offset((*linep)->line, start);
01639                     loop = 0;
01640                     break;
01641                 }
01642 
01643                 end = i + 1;
01644                 endj = j + 1;
01645                 chop = 0;
01646             }
01647             i++;
01648         }
01649     }
01650 
01651     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
01652     txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel ? UNDO_STO : UNDO_CTO, oldl, oldc, oldl, *charp);
01653 }
01654 
01655 static void txt_wrap_move_eol(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, short sel)
01656 {
01657     Text *text = st->text;
01658     TextLine **linep;
01659     int *charp;
01660     int oldl, oldc, i, j, max, start, end, endj, chop, loop;
01661     char ch;
01662 
01663     text_update_character_width(st);
01664 
01665     if (sel) linep = &text->sell, charp = &text->selc;
01666     else linep = &text->curl, charp = &text->curc;
01667 
01668     oldc = *charp;
01669     oldl = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep);
01670 
01671     max = wrap_width(st, ar);
01672 
01673     start = endj = 0;
01674     end = max;
01675     chop = loop = 1;
01676     *charp = 0;
01677 
01678     for (i = 0, j = 0; loop; j += BLI_str_utf8_size((*linep)->line + j)) {
01679         int chars;
01680         /* Mimic replacement of tabs */
01681         ch = (*linep)->line[j];
01682         if (ch == '\t') {
01683             chars = st->tabnumber - i % st->tabnumber;
01684             ch = ' ';
01685         }
01686         else chars = 1;
01687 
01688         while (chars--) {
01689             if (i - start >= max) {
01690                 if (chop) endj = BLI_str_prev_char_utf8((*linep)->line + j) - (*linep)->line;
01691 
01692                 if (endj >= oldc) {
01693                     if (ch == '\0') *charp = (*linep)->len;
01694                     else *charp = endj;
01695                     loop = 0;
01696                     break;
01697                 }
01698 
01699                 start = end;
01700                 end += max;
01701                 chop = 1;
01702             }
01703             else if (ch == '\0') {
01704                 *charp = (*linep)->len;
01705                 loop = 0;
01706                 break;
01707             }
01708             else if (ch == ' ' || ch == '-') {
01709                 end = i + 1;
01710                 endj = j;
01711                 chop = 0;
01712             }
01713             i++;
01714         }
01715     }
01716 
01717     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
01718     txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel ? UNDO_STO : UNDO_CTO, oldl, oldc, oldl, *charp);
01719 }
01720 
01721 static void txt_wrap_move_up(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, short sel)
01722 {
01723     Text *text = st->text;
01724     TextLine **linep;
01725     int *charp;
01726     int oldl, oldc, offl, offc, col, newl;
01727 
01728     text_update_character_width(st);
01729 
01730     if (sel) linep = &text->sell, charp = &text->selc;
01731     else linep = &text->curl, charp = &text->curc;
01732 
01733     /* store previous position */
01734     oldc = *charp;
01735     newl = oldl = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep);
01736 
01737     wrap_offset_in_line(st, ar, *linep, *charp, &offl, &offc);
01738     col = text_get_char_pos(st, (*linep)->line, *charp) + offc;
01739     if (offl) {
01740         *charp = text_get_cursor_rel(st, ar, *linep, offl - 1, col);
01741         newl = BLI_findindex(&text->lines, linep);
01742     }
01743     else {
01744         if ((*linep)->prev) {
01745             int visible_lines;
01746 
01747             *linep = (*linep)->prev;
01748             visible_lines = text_get_visible_lines(st, ar, (*linep)->line);
01749             *charp = text_get_cursor_rel(st, ar, *linep, visible_lines - 1, col);
01750             newl--;
01751         }
01752         else *charp = 0;
01753     }
01754 
01755     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
01756     txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel ? UNDO_STO : UNDO_CTO, oldl, oldc, newl, *charp);
01757 }
01758 
01759 static void txt_wrap_move_down(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, short sel)
01760 {
01761     Text *text = st->text;
01762     TextLine **linep;
01763     int *charp;
01764     int oldl, oldc, offl, offc, col, newl, visible_lines;
01765 
01766     text_update_character_width(st);
01767 
01768     if (sel) linep = &text->sell, charp = &text->selc;
01769     else linep = &text->curl, charp = &text->curc;
01770 
01771     /* store previous position */
01772     oldc = *charp;
01773     newl = oldl = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep);
01774 
01775     wrap_offset_in_line(st, ar, *linep, *charp, &offl, &offc);
01776     col = text_get_char_pos(st, (*linep)->line, *charp) + offc;
01777     visible_lines = text_get_visible_lines(st, ar, (*linep)->line);
01778     if (offl < visible_lines - 1) {
01779         *charp = text_get_cursor_rel(st, ar, *linep, offl + 1, col);
01780         newl = BLI_findindex(&text->lines, linep);
01781     }
01782     else {
01783         if ((*linep)->next) {
01784             *linep = (*linep)->next;
01785             *charp = text_get_cursor_rel(st, ar, *linep, 0, col);
01786             newl++;
01787         }
01788         else *charp = (*linep)->len;
01789     }
01790 
01791     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
01792     txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel ? UNDO_STO : UNDO_CTO, oldl, oldc, newl, *charp);
01793 }
01794 
01795 /* Moves the cursor vertically by the specified number of lines.
01796  * If the destination line is shorter than the current cursor position, the
01797  * cursor will be positioned at the end of this line.
01798  *
01799  * This is to replace screen_skip for PageUp/Down operations.
01800  */
01801 static void cursor_skip(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, Text *text, int lines, int sel)
01802 {
01803     TextLine **linep;
01804     int oldl, oldc, *charp;
01805     
01806     if (sel) linep = &text->sell, charp = &text->selc;
01807     else linep = &text->curl, charp = &text->curc;
01808     oldl = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep);
01809     oldc = *charp;
01810 
01811     if (st && ar && st->wordwrap) {
01812         int rell, relc;
01813 
01814         /* find line and offsets inside it needed to set cursor position */
01815         if (cursor_skip_find_line(st, ar, lines, linep, charp, &rell, &relc))
01816             *charp = text_get_cursor_rel(st, ar, *linep, rell, relc);
01817     }
01818     else {
01819         while (lines > 0 && (*linep)->next) {
01820             *linep = (*linep)->next;
01821             lines--;
01822         }
01823         while (lines < 0 && (*linep)->prev) {
01824             *linep = (*linep)->prev;
01825             lines++;
01826         }
01827     }
01828 
01829     if (*charp > (*linep)->len) *charp = (*linep)->len;
01830 
01831     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
01832     txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel ? UNDO_STO : UNDO_CTO, oldl, oldc, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), *charp);
01833 }
01834 
01835 static int text_move_cursor(bContext *C, int type, int select)
01836 {
01837     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
01838     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
01839     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
01840 
01841     /* ensure we have the right region, it's optional */
01842     if (ar && ar->regiontype != RGN_TYPE_WINDOW)
01843         ar = NULL;
01844 
01845     switch (type) {
01846         case LINE_BEGIN:
01847             if (st && st->wordwrap && ar) txt_wrap_move_bol(st, ar, select);
01848             else txt_move_bol(text, select);
01849             break;
01850             
01851         case LINE_END:
01852             if (st && st->wordwrap && ar) txt_wrap_move_eol(st, ar, select);
01853             else txt_move_eol(text, select);
01854             break;
01855 
01856         case FILE_TOP:
01857             txt_move_bof(text, select);
01858             break;
01859             
01860         case FILE_BOTTOM:
01861             txt_move_eof(text, select);
01862             break;
01863 
01864         case PREV_WORD:
01865             txt_jump_left(text, select);
01866             break;
01867 
01868         case NEXT_WORD:
01869             txt_jump_right(text, select);
01870             break;
01871 
01872         case PREV_CHAR:
01873             txt_move_left(text, select);
01874             break;
01875 
01876         case NEXT_CHAR: 
01877             txt_move_right(text, select);
01878             break;
01879 
01880         case PREV_LINE:
01881             if (st && st->wordwrap && ar) txt_wrap_move_up(st, ar, select);
01882             else txt_move_up(text, select);
01883             break;
01884             
01885         case NEXT_LINE:
01886             if (st && st->wordwrap && ar) txt_wrap_move_down(st, ar, select);
01887             else txt_move_down(text, select);
01888             break;
01889 
01890         case PREV_PAGE:
01891             if (st) cursor_skip(st, ar, st->text, -st->viewlines, select);
01892             else cursor_skip(NULL, NULL, text, -10, select);
01893             break;
01894 
01895         case NEXT_PAGE:
01896             if (st) cursor_skip(st, ar, st->text, st->viewlines, select);
01897             else cursor_skip(NULL, NULL, text, 10, select);
01898             break;
01899     }
01900 
01901     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
01902     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, text);
01903 
01904     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01905 }
01906 
01907 static int text_move_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01908 {
01909     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
01910 
01911     return text_move_cursor(C, type, 0);
01912 }
01913 
01914 void TEXT_OT_move(wmOperatorType *ot)
01915 {
01916     /* identifiers */
01917     ot->name = "Move Cursor";
01918     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_move";
01919     ot->description = "Move cursor to position type";
01920     
01921     /* api callbacks */
01922     ot->exec = text_move_exec;
01923     ot->poll = text_edit_poll;
01924 
01925     /* properties */
01926     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", move_type_items, LINE_BEGIN, "Type", "Where to move cursor to");
01927 }

01929 /******************* move select operator ********************/
01930 
01931 static int text_move_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01932 {
01933     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
01934 
01935     return text_move_cursor(C, type, 1);
01936 }
01937 
01938 void TEXT_OT_move_select(wmOperatorType *ot)
01939 {
01940     /* identifiers */
01941     ot->name = "Move Select";
01942     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_move_select";
01943     ot->description = "Make selection from current cursor position to new cursor position type";
01944

01947     ot->poll = text_space_edit_poll;

01951 }
01952 
01953 /******************* jump operator *********************/
01954 
01955 static int text_jump_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01956 {
01957     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
01958     int line = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "line");
01959     short nlines = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->lines.last) + 1;
01960 
01961     if (line < 1)
01962         txt_move_toline(text, 1, 0);
01963     else if (line > nlines)
01964         txt_move_toline(text, nlines - 1, 0);
01965     else
01966         txt_move_toline(text, line - 1, 0);
01967 
01968     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
01969     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, text);
01970 
01971     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01972 }
01973 
01974 static int text_jump_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01975 {
01976     return WM_operator_props_dialog_popup(C, op, 200, 100);
01977 
01978 }
01979 
01980 void TEXT_OT_jump(wmOperatorType *ot)
01981 {
01982     /* identifiers */
01983     ot->name = "Jump";
01984     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_jump";
01985     ot->description = "Jump cursor to line";
01986     
01987     /* api callbacks */
01988     ot->invoke = text_jump_invoke;
01989     ot->exec = text_jump_exec;
01990     ot->poll = text_edit_poll;
01991 
01992     /* properties */
01993     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "line", 1, 1, INT_MAX, "Line", "Line number to jump to", 1, 10000);
01994 }
01995 
01996 /******************* delete operator **********************/
01997 
01998 static EnumPropertyItem delete_type_items[] = {
01999     {DEL_NEXT_CHAR, "NEXT_CHARACTER", 0, "Next Character", ""},
02000     {DEL_PREV_CHAR, "PREVIOUS_CHARACTER", 0, "Previous Character", ""},
02001     {DEL_NEXT_WORD, "NEXT_WORD", 0, "Next Word", ""},
02002     {DEL_PREV_WORD, "PREVIOUS_WORD", 0, "Previous Word", ""},
02003     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
02004 
02005 static int text_delete_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02006 {
02007     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
02008     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
02009 
02010     text_drawcache_tag_update(CTX_wm_space_text(C), 0);
02011 
02012     if (type == DEL_PREV_WORD)
02013         txt_backspace_word(text);
02014     else if (type == DEL_PREV_CHAR)
02015         txt_backspace_char(text);
02016     else if (type == DEL_NEXT_WORD)
02017         txt_delete_word(text);
02018     else if (type == DEL_NEXT_CHAR)
02019         txt_delete_char(text);
02020 
02021     text_update_line_edited(text->curl);
02022 
02023     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02024     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
02025 
02026     /* run the script while editing, evil but useful */
02027     if (CTX_wm_space_text(C)->live_edit)
02028         text_run_script(C, NULL);
02029     
02030     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02031 }
02032 
02033 void TEXT_OT_delete(wmOperatorType *ot)
02034 {
02035     /* identifiers */
02036     ot->name = "Delete";
02037     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_delete";
02038     ot->description = "Delete text by cursor position";
02039     
02040     /* api callbacks */
02041     ot->exec = text_delete_exec;
02042     ot->poll = text_edit_poll;
02043 
02044     /* properties */
02045     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", delete_type_items, DEL_NEXT_CHAR, "Type", "Which part of the text to delete");
02046 }
02047 
02048 /******************* toggle overwrite operator **********************/
02049 
02050 static int text_toggle_overwrite_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02051 {
02052     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02053 
02054     st->overwrite = !st->overwrite;
02055 
02056     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, st->text);
02057 
02058     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02059 }
02060 
02061 void TEXT_OT_overwrite_toggle(wmOperatorType *ot)
02062 {
02063     /* identifiers */
02064     ot->name = "Toggle Overwrite";
02065     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_overwrite_toggle";
02066     ot->description = "Toggle overwrite while typing";
02067     
02068     /* api callbacks */
02069     ot->exec = text_toggle_overwrite_exec;
02070     ot->poll = text_space_edit_poll;
02071 }
02072 
02073 /******************* scroll operator **********************/
02074 
02075 /* Moves the view vertically by the specified number of lines */
02076 static void txt_screen_skip(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, int lines)
02077 {
02078     int last;
02079 
02080     st->top += lines;
02081 
02082     last = text_get_total_lines(st, ar);
02083     last = last - (st->viewlines / 2);
02084     
02085     if (st->top > last) st->top = last;
02086     if (st->top < 0) st->top = 0;
02087 }
02088 
02089 /* quick enum for tsc->zone (scroller handles) */
02090 enum {
02091     SCROLLHANDLE_BAR,
02092     SCROLLHANDLE_MIN_OUTSIDE,
02093     SCROLLHANDLE_MAX_OUTSIDE
02094 };
02095 
02096 typedef struct TextScroll {
02097     short old[2];
02098     short delta[2];
02099 
02100     int first;
02101     int scrollbar;
02102 
02103     int zone;
02104 } TextScroll;
02105 
02106 static int text_scroll_poll(bContext *C)
02107 {
02108     /* it should be possible to still scroll linked texts to read them, even if they can't be edited... */
02109     return CTX_data_edit_text(C) != NULL;
02110 }
02111 
02112 static int text_scroll_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02113 {
02114     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02115     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02116 
02117     int lines = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "lines");
02118 
02119     if (lines == 0)
02120         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02121 
02122     txt_screen_skip(st, ar, lines * U.wheellinescroll);
02123 
02124     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
02125 
02126     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02127 }
02128 
02129 static void text_scroll_apply(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02130 {
02131     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02132     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02133     TextScroll *tsc = op->customdata;
02134     int mval[2] = {event->x, event->y};
02135     short txtdelta[2] = {0, 0};
02136 
02137     text_update_character_width(st);
02138 
02139     if (tsc->first) {
02140         tsc->old[0] = mval[0];
02141         tsc->old[1] = mval[1];
02142         tsc->first = 0;
02143     }
02144 
02145     tsc->delta[0] += mval[0] - tsc->old[0];
02146     tsc->delta[1] += mval[1] - tsc->old[1];
02147 
02148     if (!tsc->scrollbar) {
02149         txtdelta[0] = -tsc->delta[0] / st->cwidth;
02150         txtdelta[1] = tsc->delta[1] / st->lheight;
02151 
02152         tsc->delta[0] %= st->cwidth;
02153         tsc->delta[1] %= st->lheight;
02154     }
02155     else {
02156         txtdelta[1] = -tsc->delta[1] * st->pix_per_line;
02157         tsc->delta[1] += txtdelta[1] / st->pix_per_line;
02158     }
02159 
02160     if (txtdelta[0] || txtdelta[1]) {
02161         txt_screen_skip(st, ar, txtdelta[1]);
02162 
02163         if (st->wordwrap) {
02164             st->left = 0;
02165         }
02166         else {
02167             st->left += txtdelta[0];
02168             if (st->left < 0) st->left = 0;
02169         }
02170 
02171         ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
02172     }
02173 
02174     tsc->old[0] = mval[0];
02175     tsc->old[1] = mval[1];
02176 }
02177 
02178 static void scroll_exit(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02179 {
02180     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02181 
02182     st->flags &= ~ST_SCROLL_SELECT;
02183     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
02184 }
02185 
02186 static int text_scroll_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02187 {
02188     TextScroll *tsc = op->customdata;
02189     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02190     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02191 
02192     switch (event->type) {
02193         case MOUSEMOVE:
02194             if (tsc->zone == SCROLLHANDLE_BAR)
02195                 text_scroll_apply(C, op, event);
02196             break;
02197         case LEFTMOUSE:
02198         case RIGHTMOUSE:
02199         case MIDDLEMOUSE:
02200             if (ELEM(tsc->zone, SCROLLHANDLE_MIN_OUTSIDE, SCROLLHANDLE_MAX_OUTSIDE)) {
02201                 int last;
02202 
02203                 st->top += st->viewlines * (tsc->zone == SCROLLHANDLE_MIN_OUTSIDE ? 1 : -1);
02204 
02205                 last = text_get_total_lines(st, ar);
02206                 last = last - (st->viewlines / 2);
02207 
02208                 CLAMP(st->top, 0, last);
02209 
02210                 ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
02211             }
02212             scroll_exit(C, op);
02213             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02214     }
02215 
02216     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02217 }
02218 
02219 static int text_scroll_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02220 {
02221     scroll_exit(C, op);
02222 
02223     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02224 }
02225 
02226 static int text_scroll_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02227 {
02228     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02229     TextScroll *tsc;
02230     
02231     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "lines"))
02232         return text_scroll_exec(C, op);
02233     
02234     tsc = MEM_callocN(sizeof(TextScroll), "TextScroll");
02235     tsc->first = 1;
02236     tsc->zone = SCROLLHANDLE_BAR;
02237     op->customdata = tsc;
02238     
02239     st->flags |= ST_SCROLL_SELECT;
02240     
02241     if (event->type == MOUSEPAN) {
02242         text_update_character_width(st);
02243         
02244         tsc->old[0] = event->x;
02245         tsc->old[1] = event->y;
02246         /* Sensitivity of scroll set to 4pix per line/char */
02247         tsc->delta[0] = (event->x - event->prevx) * st->cwidth / 4;
02248         tsc->delta[1] = (event->y - event->prevy) * st->lheight / 4;
02249         tsc->first = 0;
02250         tsc->scrollbar = 0;
02251         text_scroll_apply(C, op, event);
02252         scroll_exit(C, op);
02253         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02254     }
02255 
02256     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
02257     
02258     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02259 }
02260 
02261 void TEXT_OT_scroll(wmOperatorType *ot)
02262 {
02263     /* identifiers */
02264     ot->name = "Scroll";
02265     /* don't really see the difference between this and
02266      * scroll_bar. Both do basically the same thing (aside 
02267      * from keymaps).*/
02268     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_scroll";
02269     ot->description = "Scroll text screen";
02270     
02271     /* api callbacks */
02272     ot->exec = text_scroll_exec;
02273     ot->invoke = text_scroll_invoke;
02274     ot->modal = text_scroll_modal;
02275     ot->cancel = text_scroll_cancel;
02276     ot->poll = text_scroll_poll;
02277 
02278     /* flags */
02279     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING | OPTYPE_GRAB_POINTER;
02280 
02281     /* properties */
02282     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "lines", 1, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Lines", "Number of lines to scroll", -100, 100);
02283 }
02284 
02285 /******************** scroll bar operator *******************/
02286 
02287 static int text_region_scroll_poll(bContext *C)
02288 {
02289     /* same as text_region_edit_poll except it works on libdata too */
02290     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02291     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
02292     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02293 
02294     if (!st || !text)
02295         return 0;
02296     
02297     if (!ar || ar->regiontype != RGN_TYPE_WINDOW)
02298         return 0;
02299     
02300     return 1;
02301 }
02302 
02303 static int text_scroll_bar_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02304 {
02305     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02306     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02307     TextScroll *tsc;
02308     const int *mval = event->mval;
02309     int zone = -1;
02310 
02311     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "lines"))
02312         return text_scroll_exec(C, op);
02313     
02314     /* verify we are in the right zone */
02315     if (mval[0] > st->txtbar.xmin && mval[0] < st->txtbar.xmax) {
02316         if (mval[1] >= st->txtbar.ymin && mval[1] <= st->txtbar.ymax) {
02317             /* mouse inside scroll handle */
02318             zone = SCROLLHANDLE_BAR;
02319         }
02320         else if (mval[1] > TXT_SCROLL_SPACE && mval[1] < ar->winy - TXT_SCROLL_SPACE) {
02321             if (mval[1] < st->txtbar.ymin) zone = SCROLLHANDLE_MIN_OUTSIDE;
02322             else zone = SCROLLHANDLE_MAX_OUTSIDE;
02323         }
02324     }
02325 
02326     if (zone == -1) {
02327         /* we are outside slider - nothing to do */
02328         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02329     }
02330 
02331     tsc = MEM_callocN(sizeof(TextScroll), "TextScroll");
02332     tsc->first = 1;
02333     tsc->scrollbar = 1;
02334     tsc->zone = zone;
02335     op->customdata = tsc;
02336     st->flags |= ST_SCROLL_SELECT;
02337 
02338     /* jump scroll, works in v2d but needs to be added here too :S */
02339     if (event->type == MIDDLEMOUSE) {
02340         tsc->old[0] = ar->winrct.xmin + (st->txtbar.xmax + st->txtbar.xmin) / 2;
02341         tsc->old[1] = ar->winrct.ymin + (st->txtbar.ymax + st->txtbar.ymin) / 2;
02342 
02343         tsc->delta[0] = 0;
02344         tsc->delta[1] = 0;
02345         tsc->first = 0;
02346         tsc->zone = SCROLLHANDLE_BAR;
02347         text_scroll_apply(C, op, event);
02348     }
02349 
02350     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
02351 
02352     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02353 }
02354 
02355 void TEXT_OT_scroll_bar(wmOperatorType *ot)
02356 {
02357     /* identifiers */
02358     ot->name = "Scrollbar";
02359     /* don't really see the difference between this and
02360      * scroll. Both do basically the same thing (aside 
02361      * from keymaps).*/
02362     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_scroll_bar";
02363     ot->description = "Scroll text screen";
02364     
02365     /* api callbacks */
02366     ot->invoke = text_scroll_bar_invoke;
02367     ot->modal = text_scroll_modal;
02368     ot->cancel = text_scroll_cancel;
02369     ot->poll = text_region_scroll_poll;
02370 
02371     /* flags */
02372     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING;
02373 
02374     /* properties */
02375     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "lines", 1, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Lines", "Number of lines to scroll", -100, 100);
02376 }
02377 
02378 /******************* set selection operator **********************/
02379 
02380 typedef struct SetSelection {
02381     int selecting;
02382     int selc, sell;
02383     short old[2];
02384 } SetSelection;
02385 
02386 static int flatten_len(SpaceText *st, const char *str)
02387 {
02388     int i, total = 0;
02389 
02390     for (i = 0; str[i]; i += BLI_str_utf8_size(str + i)) {
02391         if (str[i] == '\t') {
02392             total += st->tabnumber - total % st->tabnumber;
02393         }
02394         else total++;
02395     }
02396     
02397     return total;
02398 }
02399 
02400 static int flatten_index_to_offset(SpaceText *st, const char *str, int index)
02401 {
02402     int i, j;
02403     for (i = 0, j = 0; i < index; j += BLI_str_utf8_size(str + j))
02404         if (str[j] == '\t')
02405             i += st->tabnumber - i % st->tabnumber;
02406         else
02407             i++;
02408     
02409     return j;
02410 }
02411 
02412 static TextLine *get_first_visible_line(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, int *y)
02413 {
02414     TextLine *linep = st->text->lines.first;
02415     int i;
02416     for (i = st->top; i > 0 && linep; ) {
02417         int lines = text_get_visible_lines(st, ar, linep->line);
02418         
02419         if (i - lines < 0) {
02420             *y += i;
02421             break;
02422         }
02423         else {
02424             linep = linep->next;
02425             i -= lines;
02426         }
02427     }
02428     return linep;
02429 }
02430 
02431 static void text_cursor_set_to_pos_wrapped(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, int x, int y, int sel)
02432 {
02433     Text *text = st->text;
02434     int max = wrap_width(st, ar); /* view */
02435     int charp = -1;               /* mem */
02436     int loop = 1, found = 0;      /* flags */
02437     char ch;
02438     
02439     /* Point to first visible line */
02440     TextLine *linep = get_first_visible_line(st, ar, &y);
02441     
02442     while (loop && linep) {
02443         int i = 0, start = 0, end = max; /* view */
02444         int j = 0, curs = 0, endj = 0;   /* mem */
02445         int chop = 1;                    /* flags */
02446         
02447         for (; loop; j += BLI_str_utf8_size(linep->line + j)) {
02448             int chars;
02449             
02450             /* Mimic replacement of tabs */
02451             ch = linep->line[j];
02452             if (ch == '\t') {
02453                 chars = st->tabnumber - i % st->tabnumber;
02454                 ch = ' ';
02455             }
02456             else chars = 1;
02457             
02458             while (chars--) {
02459                 /* Gone too far, go back to last wrap point */
02460                 if (y < 0) {
02461                     charp = endj;
02462                     loop = 0;
02463                     break;
02464                     /* Exactly at the cursor */
02465                 }
02466                 else if (y == 0 && i - start == x) {
02467                     /* current position could be wrapped to next line */
02468                     /* this should be checked when end of current line would be reached */
02469                     charp = curs = j;
02470                     found = 1;
02471                     /* Prepare curs for next wrap */
02472                 }
02473                 else if (i - end == x) {
02474                     curs = j;
02475                 }
02476                 if (i - start >= max) {
02477                     if (found) {
02478                         /* exact cursor position was found, check if it's */
02479                         /* still on needed line (hasn't been wrapped) */
02480                         if (charp > endj && !chop && ch != '\0') charp = endj;
02481                         loop = 0;
02482                         break;
02483                     }
02484                     
02485                     if (chop) endj = j;
02486                     start = end;
02487                     end += max;
02488                     
02489                     if (j < linep->len)
02490                         y--;
02491                     
02492                     chop = 1;
02493                     if (y == 0 && i - start >= x) {
02494                         charp = curs;
02495                         loop = 0;
02496                         break;
02497                     }
02498                 }
02499                 else if (ch == ' ' || ch == '-' || ch == '\0') {
02500                     if (found) {
02501                         loop = 0;
02502                         break;
02503                     }
02504                     
02505                     if (y == 0 && i - start >= x) {
02506                         charp = curs;
02507                         loop = 0;
02508                         break;
02509                     }
02510                     end = i + 1;
02511                     endj = j;
02512                     chop = 0;
02513                 }
02514                 i++;
02515             }
02516             
02517             if (ch == '\0') break;
02518         }
02519         
02520         if (!loop || found) break;
02521         
02522         if (!linep->next) {
02523             charp = linep->len;
02524             break;
02525         }
02526         
02527         /* On correct line but didn't meet cursor, must be at end */
02528         if (y == 0) {
02529             charp = linep->len;
02530             break;
02531         }
02532         linep = linep->next;
02533         
02534         y--;
02535     }
02536 
02537     if (linep && charp != -1) {
02538         if (sel) { text->sell = linep; text->selc = charp; }
02539         else { text->curl = linep; text->curc = charp; }
02540     }
02541 }
02542 
02543 static void text_cursor_set_to_pos(SpaceText *st, ARegion *ar, int x, int y, int sel)
02544 {
02545     Text *text = st->text;
02546     text_update_character_width(st);
02547     y = (ar->winy - 2 - y) / st->lheight;
02548 
02549     if (st->showlinenrs) x -= TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC;
02550     else x -= TXT_OFFSET;
02551 
02552     if (x < 0) x = 0;
02553     x = text_pixel_x_to_index(st, x) + st->left;
02554     
02555     if (st->wordwrap) {
02556         text_cursor_set_to_pos_wrapped(st, ar, x, y, sel);
02557     }
02558     else {
02559         TextLine **linep;
02560         int *charp;
02561         int w;
02562         
02563         if (sel) { linep = &text->sell; charp = &text->selc; }
02564         else { linep = &text->curl; charp = &text->curc; }
02565         
02566         y -= txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep) - st->top;
02567         
02568         if (y > 0) {
02569             while (y-- != 0) if ((*linep)->next) *linep = (*linep)->next;
02570         }
02571         else if (y < 0) {
02572             while (y++ != 0) if ((*linep)->prev) *linep = (*linep)->prev;
02573         }
02574 
02575         
02576         w = flatten_len(st, (*linep)->line);
02577         if (x < w) *charp = flatten_index_to_offset(st, (*linep)->line, x);
02578         else *charp = (*linep)->len;
02579     }
02580     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
02581 }
02582 
02583 static void text_cursor_set_apply(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02584 {
02585     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02586     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02587     SetSelection *ssel = op->customdata;
02588 
02589     if (event->mval[1] < 0 || event->mval[1] > ar->winy) {
02590         int d = (ssel->old[1] - event->mval[1]) * st->pix_per_line;
02591         if (d) txt_screen_skip(st, ar, d);
02592 
02593         text_cursor_set_to_pos(st, ar, event->mval[0], event->mval[1] < 0 ? 0 : ar->winy, 1);
02594 
02595         text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02596         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, st->text);
02597     } 
02598     else if (!st->wordwrap && (event->mval[0] < 0 || event->mval[0] > ar->winx)) {
02599         if (event->mval[0] > ar->winx) st->left++;
02600         else if (event->mval[0] < 0 && st->left > 0) st->left--;
02601         
02602         text_cursor_set_to_pos(st, ar, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], 1);
02603         
02604         text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02605         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, st->text);
02606         // XXX PIL_sleep_ms(10);
02607     } 
02608     else {
02609         text_cursor_set_to_pos(st, ar, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], 1);
02610 
02611         text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02612         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, st->text);
02613 
02614         ssel->old[0] = event->mval[0];
02615         ssel->old[1] = event->mval[1];
02616     } 
02617 }
02618 
02619 static void text_cursor_set_exit(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02620 {
02621     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02622     Text *text = st->text;
02623     SetSelection *ssel = op->customdata;
02624     int linep2, charp2;
02625     char *buffer;
02626 
02627     if (txt_has_sel(text)) {
02628         buffer = txt_sel_to_buf(text);
02629         WM_clipboard_text_set(buffer, 1);
02630         MEM_freeN(buffer);
02631     }
02632 
02633     linep2 = txt_get_span(st->text->lines.first, st->text->sell);
02634     charp2 = st->text->selc;
02635         
02636     if (ssel->sell != linep2 || ssel->selc != charp2)
02637         txt_undo_add_toop(st->text, UNDO_STO, ssel->sell, ssel->selc, linep2, charp2);
02638 
02639     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02640     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, st->text);
02641 
02642     MEM_freeN(ssel);
02643 }
02644 
02645 static int text_set_selection_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02646 {
02647     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02648     SetSelection *ssel;
02649 
02650     if (event->mval[0] >= st->txtbar.xmin)
02651         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02652 
02653     op->customdata = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SetSelection), "SetCursor");
02654     ssel = op->customdata;
02655     ssel->selecting = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "select");
02656 
02657     ssel->old[0] = event->mval[0];
02658     ssel->old[1] = event->mval[1];
02659 
02660     ssel->sell = txt_get_span(st->text->lines.first, st->text->sell);
02661     ssel->selc = st->text->selc;
02662 
02663     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
02664 
02665     text_cursor_set_apply(C, op, event);
02666 
02667     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02668 }
02669 
02670 static int text_set_selection_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02671 {
02672     switch (event->type) {
02673         case LEFTMOUSE:
02674         case MIDDLEMOUSE:
02675         case RIGHTMOUSE:
02676             text_cursor_set_exit(C, op);
02677             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02678         case MOUSEMOVE:
02679             text_cursor_set_apply(C, op, event);
02680             break;
02681     }
02682 
02683     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
02684 }
02685 
02686 static int text_set_selection_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02687 {
02688     text_cursor_set_exit(C, op);
02689     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02690 }
02691

02709 /******************* set cursor operator **********************/
02710 
02711 static int text_cursor_set_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02712 {
02713     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02714     Text *text = st->text;
02715     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02716     int x = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "x");
02717     int y = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "y");
02718     int oldl, oldc;
02719 
02720     oldl = txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->curl);
02721     oldc = text->curc;
02722 
02723     text_cursor_set_to_pos(st, ar, x, y, 0);
02724 
02725     txt_undo_add_toop(text, UNDO_CTO, oldl, oldc, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->curl), text->curc);
02726 
02727     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02728     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, st->text);
02729 
02730     return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02731 }
02732 
02733 static int text_cursor_set_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02734 {
02735     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02736 
02737     if (event->mval[0] >= st->txtbar.xmin)
02738         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02739 
02740     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "x", event->mval[0]);
02741     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "y", event->mval[1]);
02742 
02743     return text_cursor_set_exec(C, op);
02744 }
02745 
02746 void TEXT_OT_cursor_set(wmOperatorType *ot)
02747 {
02748     /* identifiers */

02750     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_cursor_set";
02751     ot->description = "Set cursor position";
02752 
02753     /* api callbacks */
02754     ot->invoke = text_cursor_set_invoke;
02755     ot->exec = text_cursor_set_exec;
02756     ot->poll = text_region_edit_poll;
02757 
02758     /* properties */
02759     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "x", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "X", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02760     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "y", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Y", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
