02762 
02763 /******************* line number operator **********************/
02764 
02765 static int text_line_number_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *event)
02766 {
02767     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02768     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
02769     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02770     const int *mval = event->mval;
02771     double time;
02772     static int jump_to = 0;
02773     static double last_jump = 0;
02774 
02775     text_update_character_width(st);
02776 
02777     if (!st->showlinenrs)
02778         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02779 
02780     if (!(mval[0] > 2 && mval[0] < (TXT_OFFSET + TEXTXLOC) && mval[1] > 2 && mval[1] < ar->winy - 2))
02781         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02782 
02783     if (!(event->ascii >= '0' && event->ascii <= '9'))
02784         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02785 
02786     time = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
02787     if (last_jump < time - 1)
02788         jump_to = 0;
02789 
02790     jump_to *= 10;
02791     jump_to += (int)(event->ascii - '0');
02792 
02793     txt_move_toline(text, jump_to - 1, 0);
02794     last_jump = time;
02795 
02796     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02797     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, text);
02798 
02799     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02800 }
02801 
02802 void TEXT_OT_line_number(wmOperatorType *ot)
02803 {
02804     /* identifiers */
02805     ot->name = "Line Number";
02806     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_line_number";
02807     ot->description = "The current line number";
02808     
02809     /* api callbacks */
02810     ot->invoke = text_line_number_invoke;
02811     ot->poll = text_region_edit_poll;
02812 }
02813 
02814 /******************* insert operator **********************/
02815 
02816 static int text_insert_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02817 {
02818     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02819     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
02820     char *str;
02821     int done = 0;
02822     size_t i = 0;
02823     unsigned int code;
02824 
02825     text_drawcache_tag_update(st, 0);
02826 
02827     str = RNA_string_get_alloc(op->ptr, "text", NULL, 0);
02828 
02829     if (st && st->overwrite) {
02830         while (str[i]) {
02831             code = BLI_str_utf8_as_unicode_step(str, &i);
02832             done |= txt_replace_char(text, code);
02833         }
02834     }
02835     else {
02836         while (str[i]) {
02837             code = BLI_str_utf8_as_unicode_step(str, &i);
02838             done |= txt_add_char(text, code);
02839         }
02840     }
02841 
02842     MEM_freeN(str);
02843     
02844     if (!done)
02845         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02846 
02847     text_update_line_edited(text->curl);
02848 
02849     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02850     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
02851 
02852     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02853 }
02854 
02855 static int text_insert_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02856 {
02857     int ret;
02858 
02859     // if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "text")) { /* always set from keymap XXX */
02860     if (!RNA_string_length(op->ptr, "text")) {
02861         /* if alt/ctrl/super are pressed pass through */
02862         if (event->ctrl || event->oskey) {
02863             return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
02864         }
02865         else {
02866             char str[BLI_UTF8_MAX + 1];
02867             size_t len;
02868             
02869             if (event->utf8_buf[0]) {
02870                 len = BLI_str_utf8_size(event->utf8_buf);
02871                 memcpy(str, event->utf8_buf, len);
02872             }
02873             else {
02874                 /* in theory, ghost can set value to extended ascii here */
02875                 len = BLI_str_utf8_from_unicode(event->ascii, str);
02876             }
02877             str[len] = '\0';
02878             RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "text", str);
02879         }
02880     }
02881 
02882     ret = text_insert_exec(C, op);
02883     
02884     /* run the script while editing, evil but useful */
02885     if (ret == OPERATOR_FINISHED && CTX_wm_space_text(C)->live_edit)
02886         text_run_script(C, NULL);
02887 
02888     return ret;
02889 }
02890 
02891 void TEXT_OT_insert(wmOperatorType *ot)
02892 {
02893     PropertyRNA *prop;
02894 
02895     /* identifiers */
02896     ot->name = "Insert";
02897     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_insert";
02898     ot->description = "Insert text at cursor position";
02899     
02900     /* api callbacks */
02901     ot->exec = text_insert_exec;
02902     ot->invoke = text_insert_invoke;
02903     ot->poll = text_edit_poll;
02904 
02905     /* properties */
02906     prop = RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "text", "", 0, "Text", "Text to insert at the cursor position");
02907     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
02908 }
02909 
02910 /******************* find operator *********************/
02911 
02912 /* mode */
02913 #define TEXT_FIND       0
02914 #define TEXT_REPLACE    1
02915 #define TEXT_MARK_ALL   2
02916 
02917 static int text_find_and_replace(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, short mode)
02918 {
02919     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
02920     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);
02921     Text *start = NULL, *text = st->text;
02922     int flags, first = 1;
02923     int found = 0;
02924     char *tmp;
02925 
02926     if (!st->findstr[0] || (mode == TEXT_REPLACE && !st->replacestr[0]))
02927         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02928 
02929     flags = st->flags;
02930     if (flags & ST_FIND_ALL)
02931         flags ^= ST_FIND_WRAP;
02932 
02933     do {
02934         int proceed = 0;
02935 
02936         if (first) {
02937             if (text->markers.first)
02938                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
02939 
02940             txt_clear_markers(text, TMARK_GRP_FINDALL, 0);
02941         }
02942 
02943         first = 0;
02944         
02945         /* Replace current */
02946         if (mode != TEXT_FIND && txt_has_sel(text)) {
02947             tmp = txt_sel_to_buf(text);
02948 
02949             if (flags & ST_MATCH_CASE) proceed = strcmp(st->findstr, tmp) == 0;
02950             else proceed = BLI_strcasecmp(st->findstr, tmp) == 0;
02951 
02952             if (proceed) {
02953                 if (mode == TEXT_REPLACE) {
02954                     txt_insert_buf(text, st->replacestr);
02955                     if (text->curl && text->curl->format) {
02956                         MEM_freeN(text->curl->format);
02957                         text->curl->format = NULL;
02958                     }
02959                     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02960                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
02961                     text_drawcache_tag_update(CTX_wm_space_text(C), 1);
02962                 }
02963                 else if (mode == TEXT_MARK_ALL) {
02964                     unsigned char color[4];
02965                     UI_GetThemeColor4ubv(TH_SHADE2, color);
02966 
02967                     if (txt_find_marker(text, text->curl, text->selc, TMARK_GRP_FINDALL, 0)) {
02968                         if (tmp) MEM_freeN(tmp), tmp = NULL;
02969                         break;
02970                     }
02971 
02972                     txt_add_marker(text, text->curl, text->curc, text->selc, color, TMARK_GRP_FINDALL, TMARK_EDITALL);
02973                     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02974                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
02975                 }
02976             }
02977             MEM_freeN(tmp);
02978             tmp = NULL;
02979         }
02980 
02981         /* Find next */
02982         if (txt_find_string(text, st->findstr, flags & ST_FIND_WRAP, flags & ST_MATCH_CASE)) {
02983             text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02984             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, text);
02985         }
02986         else if (flags & ST_FIND_ALL) {
02987             if (text == start) break;
02988             if (!start) start = text;
02989             if (text->id.next)
02990                 text = st->text = text->id.next;
02991             else
02992                 text = st->text = bmain->text.first;
02993             txt_move_toline(text, 0, 0);
02994             text_update_cursor_moved(C);
02995             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | ND_CURSOR, text);
02996             first = 1;
02997         }
02998         else {
02999             if (!found && !proceed) BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Text not found: %s", st->findstr);
03000             break;
03001         }
03002         found = 1;
03003     } while (mode == TEXT_MARK_ALL);
03004 
03005     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03006 }
03007 
03008 static int text_find_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03009 {
03010     return text_find_and_replace(C, op, TEXT_FIND);
03011 }
03012 
03013 void TEXT_OT_find(wmOperatorType *ot)
03014 {
03015     /* identifiers */
03016     ot->name = "Find";
03017     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_find";
03018     ot->description = "Find specified text";
03019     
03020     /* api callbacks */
03021     ot->exec = text_find_exec;
03022     ot->poll = text_space_edit_poll;
03023 }

03063 /******************* find set selected *********************/

03065 static int text_find_set_selected_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03066 {
03067     SpaceText *st = CTX_wm_space_text(C);

03074

03119 
03120 /****************** resolve conflict operator ******************/
03121 
03122 enum { RESOLVE_IGNORE, RESOLVE_RELOAD, RESOLVE_SAVE, RESOLVE_MAKE_INTERNAL };
03123 static EnumPropertyItem resolution_items[] = {
03124     {RESOLVE_IGNORE, "IGNORE", 0, "Ignore", ""},
03125     {RESOLVE_RELOAD, "RELOAD", 0, "Reload", ""},
03126     {RESOLVE_SAVE, "SAVE", 0, "Save", ""},
03127     {RESOLVE_MAKE_INTERNAL, "MAKE_INTERNAL", 0, "Make Internal", ""},
03128     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
03129 };
03130 
03131 /* returns 0 if file on disk is the same or Text is in memory only
03132  * returns 1 if file has been modified on disk since last local edit
03133  * returns 2 if file on disk has been deleted
03134  * -1 is returned if an error occurs */
03135 
03136 int text_file_modified(Text *text)
03137 {
03138     struct stat st;
03139     int result;
03140     char file[FILE_MAX];
03141 
03142     if (!text || !text->name)
03143         return 0;
03144 
03145     BLI_strncpy(file, text->name, FILE_MAX);
03146     BLI_path_abs(file, G.main->name);
03147 
03148     if (!BLI_exists(file))
03149         return 2;
03150 
03151     result = stat(file, &st);
03152     
03153     if (result == -1)
03154         return -1;
03155 
03156     if ((st.st_mode & S_IFMT) != S_IFREG)
03157         return -1;
03158 
03159     if (st.st_mtime > text->mtime)
03160         return 1;
03161 
03162     return 0;
03163 }
03164 
03165 static void text_ignore_modified(Text *text)
03166 {
03167     struct stat st;
03168     int result;
03169     char file[FILE_MAX];
03170 
03171     if (!text || !text->name) return;
03172 
03173     BLI_strncpy(file, text->name, FILE_MAX);
03174     BLI_path_abs(file, G.main->name);
03175 
03176     if (!BLI_exists(file)) return;
03177 
03178     result = stat(file, &st);
03179     
03180     if (result == -1 || (st.st_mode & S_IFMT) != S_IFREG)
03181         return;
03182 
03183     text->mtime = st.st_mtime;
03184 }
03185 
03186 static int text_resolve_conflict_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03187 {
03188     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
03189     int resolution = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "resolution");
03190 
03191     switch (resolution) {
03192         case RESOLVE_RELOAD:
03193             return text_reload_exec(C, op);
03194         case RESOLVE_SAVE:
03195             return text_save_exec(C, op);
03196         case RESOLVE_MAKE_INTERNAL:
03197             return text_make_internal_exec(C, op);
03198         case RESOLVE_IGNORE:
03199             text_ignore_modified(text);
03200             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03201     }
03202 
03203     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03204 }
03205 
03206 static int text_resolve_conflict_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
03207 {
03208     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
03209     uiPopupMenu *pup;
03210     uiLayout *layout;
03211 
03212     switch (text_file_modified(text)) {
03213         case 1:
03214             if (text->flags & TXT_ISDIRTY) {
03215                 /* modified locally and externally, ahhh. offer more possibilites. */
03216                 pup = uiPupMenuBegin(C, "File Modified Outside and Inside Blender", ICON_NONE);
03217                 layout = uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
03218                 uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, op->type, "Reload from disk (ignore local changes)", 0, "resolution", RESOLVE_RELOAD);
03219                 uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, op->type, "Save to disk (ignore outside changes)", 0, "resolution", RESOLVE_SAVE);
03220                 uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, op->type, "Make text internal (separate copy)", 0, "resolution", RESOLVE_MAKE_INTERNAL);
03221                 uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
03222             }
03223             else {
03224                 pup = uiPupMenuBegin(C, "File Modified Outside Blender", ICON_NONE);
03225                 layout = uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
03226                 uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, op->type, "Reload from disk", 0, "resolution", RESOLVE_RELOAD);
03227                 uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, op->type, "Make text internal (separate copy)", 0, "resolution", RESOLVE_MAKE_INTERNAL);
03228                 uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, op->type, "Ignore", 0, "resolution", RESOLVE_IGNORE);
03229                 uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
03230             }
03231             break;
03232         case 2:
03233             pup = uiPupMenuBegin(C, "File Deleted Outside Blender", ICON_NONE);
03234             layout = uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
03235             uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, op->type, "Make text internal", 0, "resolution", RESOLVE_MAKE_INTERNAL);
03236             uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, op->type, "Recreate file", 0, "resolution", RESOLVE_SAVE);
03237             uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
03238             break;
03239     }
03240 
03241     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03242 }
03243 
03244 void TEXT_OT_resolve_conflict(wmOperatorType *ot)
03245 {
03246     /* identifiers */
03247     ot->name = "Resolve Conflict";
03248     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_resolve_conflict";
03249     ot->description = "When external text is out of sync, resolve the conflict";
03250 
03251     /* api callbacks */
03252     ot->exec = text_resolve_conflict_exec;
03253     ot->invoke = text_resolve_conflict_invoke;
03254     ot->poll = text_save_poll;
03255 
03256     /* properties */
03257     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "resolution", resolution_items, RESOLVE_IGNORE, "Resolution", "How to solve conflict due to differences in internal and external text");
03258 }
03259 
03260 /********************** to 3d object operator *****************/
03261 
03262 static int text_to_3d_object_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03263 {
03264     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
03265     int split_lines = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "split_lines");
03266 
03267     ED_text_to_object(C, text, split_lines);
03268 
03269     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03270 }
03271 
03272 void TEXT_OT_to_3d_object(wmOperatorType *ot)
03273 {
03274     /* identifiers */
03275     ot->name = "To 3D Object";
03276     ot->idname = "TEXT_OT_to_3d_object";
03277     ot->description = "Create 3d text object from active text data block";
03278     
03279     /* api callbacks */
03280     ot->exec = text_to_3d_object_exec;
03281     ot->poll = text_edit_poll;
03282     
03283     /* flags */
03284     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
03285 
03286     /* properties */
03287     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "split_lines", 0, "Split Lines", "Create one object per line in the text");
03288 }
03289 
03290 
03291 /************************ undo ******************************/
03292 
03293 void ED_text_undo_step(bContext *C, int step)
03294 {
03295     Text *text = CTX_data_edit_text(C);
03296 
03297     if (!text)
03298         return;
03299 
03300     if (step == 1)
03301         txt_do_undo(text);
03302     else if (step == -1)
03303         txt_do_redo(text);
03304 
03305     text_update_edited(text);
03306 
03307     text_update_cursor_moved(C);
03308     text_drawcache_tag_update(CTX_wm_space_text(C), 1);
03309     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXT | NA_EDITED, text);
03310 }
